annotations.description: The Trinidad Sour was created by Giuseppe Gonzales bartender at the Clover Club in New York City around 2008. He initially created it for Star Chefs (an onli...
annotations.title: Modern Classic: Trinidad Sour

textContent:
1.5oz or 45ml Angostura Bitters
.5oz or 15ml Rye Whiskey
.75oz or 20ml Lemon Juice 
1oz or 30ml Orgeat

Shake and strain.

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Qr22fzCUTaQ
title: Trinidad Sour
